message.body: Flights cancelled. Here til Friday. NY is a mess!
Oh no!
Check out the link on JJs fb page. There's a pic of the 68 st entrance to riverside park among other shocking pix
Dibo's house burned down...
OMG! He was in breezy point? They had a terrible fire. What about Jordan? Both his houses were in the path.
Yeah he was in breezy, it's terrible. I haven't talked to Jordan yet cuz he isn't in the city
And he just retired! I hope he had evacuated. Still a terrible blow. So much destruction.
Yeah but his parents are. The sag harbor house was probably flooded. I saw pic of the town
Yeah I will ask him
Have u heard anything from dad? So much damage everywhere.
Dad says the Shirley house is fine and not flooded, but his aunt josey lost her home in breezy point as well
Oh gosh I was afraid of that. So sad!
Did I ask u if u want to go to the movies tonight or tomorrow?
Ooh that would be fun! Would we see Argo? Can you look up some times for tonight and tomorrow night?
Actually I don't think I can go tomorrow at all. We can go tonight at like 6?
Ok looking now
There's a show at 715 in Virginia highlands that looks close and easy to get to. Does that work?
Sounds good!
Will u have dinner first and I'll pick u up about 630 or so?
Ok that sounds fine
Almost ready! I'm in the village it would be faster to pick me up in the cvs parking lot
I just arrived at the circle. I don't know how to get there. Please come here
Checked in so seems like I'll be flying back tomorrow morning!!
Finally you can go home! Have a safe flight! Love you, thanks for everything
Thanks! Just got to the airport and returned the car. Will let u know when I'm home. Love you too!
Home sweet home! XO
